name: fds
description: Food Delivery Service with AWS Serverless Workshop

scripts.users: CGO_ENABLED=0 GOOS=linux GOARCH=arm64 go build -C ~/apps/fds/src/users -tags lambda.norpc -o ~/apps/fds/dist/users/bootstrap main.go
scripts.orders: CGO_ENABLED=0 GOOS=linux GOARCH=arm64 go build -C ~/apps/fds/src/orders -tags lambda.norpc -o ~/apps/fds/dist/orders/bootstrap main.go
scripts.auth: CGO_ENABLED=0 GOOS=linux GOARCH=arm64 go build -C ~/apps/fds/src/authorizer -tags lambda.norpc -o ~/apps/fds/dist/auth/bootstrap authorize.go
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run users && npm run orders && npm run auth
scripts.terraform: terraform -chdir=./modules init && terraform -chdir=./modules fmt && terraform -chdir=./modules validate
scripts.deploy: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run terraform && terraform -chdir=./modules apply --auto-approve

author: Karega K Scott
